article.title: Northrop Grumman to Supply Inertial Navigation Systems to Spanish Navy
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corporation has won a contract to supply high-accuracy inertial navigation systems for four new maritime action ships that are being built for the Spanish navy. The contract is valued at more than $1.5 million and was awarded by Navantia to Northrop Grumman's Sperry Marine business unit.
